    Rmbal

    Rmabl is a material balance package for evaluation of original hydrocarbon in-place, and reservoir performance and forecast. It applies to black oil, volatile oil, gas condensate, wet gas, and dry gas reservoirs and can handle the the performance of over-pressured gas resources.

    Installation

    You can install the released version of Rmbal from CRAN with:

    install.packages("Rmbal")

    Production Drive Mechanisms
